posts.post_content:
I am selling approximately 70 T206 graded cards.  I can send scans of the cards too (wasn't able to before).  If you're interested, I can send you a spreadsheet with the list and follow up with pictures.  I can be reached at [url]RachB4980@aol.com[/url].
Thanks for your interest and consideration!!

Please send info to:
[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]

Best,
Scott
